title: Holiday Recipes Our Food Staff Can’t Wait to Make
description: Whether warmly spiced cookies, centerpiece-worthy mains or meals to feed a crowd, here’s what we’re excited to cook for our loved ones this season.
dc:creator: Nikita Richardson
media:credit: Linda Xiao for The New York Times. Food Stylist: Monica Pierini.
media:description: Clare de Boer’s hazelnut, pear and cardamom tart.
